document_data.name: Traedis
document_data.mainbody:
'''Tradeis''' ran the small temple of [[Beshaba]] in [[Ikemmu]].

In [[1479 DR]], he plotted with the [[warrior]] [[Vedoran]] and others to start a revolt against [[Uwan]]'s rule.
